title: ATUM Barcode
intro:
Here you see the barcode generated for this Purchase Order.

It can be distinct to the above example depending on your configuration.
By default, the PO ID will be used for the barcode but if you want to change it, click on the pencil icon, enter a new custom number and save.

title: Screen Options
intro: From the Screen Options tab, you can enable or disable the display of the barcodes meta box.
